title: Top Places to visit in Satrampadu, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Satrampadu is a census town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in the Eluru Mandal of the Eluru revenue division. The town is a constituent of Eluru urban agglomeration.

 

Demographics

As of the 2011 census of India, Satrampadu had a population of 6393. The total population constitute, 3,153 males and 3,240 females —a sex ratio of 1023 females per 1000 males. 533 children are in the age group of 0–6 years with a child sex ratio of 1090 girls per 1000 boys. The average literacy rate stands at 88.45% with 5654 literates.

 

Education

The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government, aided and private schools, under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools is English, Telugu.

 

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Satrampadu

Top Places to visit in Gooty, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content:
Gooty is a town in the Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the headquarters of Gooty Mandal in Anantapur revenue division. The town is renowned for the Gooty hill fort.

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Attili, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content:
Attili is a village in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It belongs to Tanuku constituency in Kovvur revenue division.
 
Demographics
As of 2011 Census of India, Attili had a population of 25004. The total population constitute, 12509 males

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.
